actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for foreign exchange adjustments in regular military compensation available to personnel stationed overseas.

summary.text: Stipulates that the regular military compensation for overseas personnel shall be adjusted periodically to reflect any changes since January 1, 1977, in the rate of exchange between the dollar and the official currency of the country in which such personnel is stationed, except where such adjustment would reduce the compensation below that payable on the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for foreign exchange adjustments in regular military compensation available to personnel stationed overseas.
